text: (Allah) yabahaye urugero kuri mwe ubwanyu (agira ati) “Ese mwaba musangiye n’abacakara banyu ibyo twabafunguriye kugeza ubwo babigizeho uburenganzira bungana n’ubwanyu; mukaba mubatinya (nk’abo muzagabana imitungo) nk’uko mutinya (kuyigabana) ubwanyu (mwe mutari abacakara? Niba mutabyishimira, ni gute mwumva ko Allah yabyishimira?) Uko ni ko dusobanurira amagambo (yacu) abantu bafite ubwenge.”
